title: omg wut!
body:
- FOOD MEMORY Cho’Gath no longer loses Feast stacks on death
- FEED THE VOID Feast can now stack infinitely (only five stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters, though they don’t have to be the first five) 

excited asf right now

replies.body: Yeah i was going through a bit of a rough slump of depression there but thanks to new meds and daily self positive reinforcement exercises im starting to enjoy past times again

Sounds good :^) hope it continues to work out for ya.

Can't wait to play Cho too :^)
damn imma be getting big af
yeah you'll enjoy having 7k hp and doing 1300 true damage every 50 seconds or so
well I mean that's not that different from old cho'gath, but the thing I'm hyped for is just getting massive. Bodyblocking skillshots for my team without even needing to move.
The not losing stacks is pretty huge...
you don't lose stacks if you don't die. Mejais cho'gath is best cho'gath.
"LET’S NOT GO CRAZY HERE Cho’Gath reaches his maximum size (and bonus attack range) at 10 stacks"
The only thing I'm interested in is that with infinite stacking, can you get so big you literally can not move nor see shit on your screen?
no it caps at 10 stacks unfortunately. its just the health gain after that.
and damage, 14 damage stack a level.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=o8zAuPd0,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-23T05:45:34.031+0000)
>
> no it caps at 10 stacks unfortanately. its just the health gain after that.

Dang, but 10 stacks still cool.
